name: Warring Kings
description:
Warring Kings is a strategy game where you play as a king waging war on behalf of his kingdom... by rolling dice!

Warring Kings is a GMTK Game Jam 2022 submission.

How to play: The icon above the troops indicate their team and an outline indicates if they are movable. Movable troops can be moved by clicking on them. This shows where they can move to. Click on a blue tile to move. Click on a non-blue tile to cancel. Once a troop has moved, they can attack. Troops have one move every turn. The next turn starts when all troops have moved.
